data.title: Gold price near all-time high amid increased bitcoin and equity volatility
data.description:
Gold is trading above $2,820, nearing Monday's all-time high, while volatility in bitcoin and U.S. equities continues to rise.
source: https://www.theblock.co/post/338533/gold-price-high-bitcoin-equity-volatility?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

data.title: Coinbase urges US regulators to remove crypto banking barriers
data.description:
Coinbase, the largest custodian for US-based spot Bitcoin ETFs, wants US state-chartered banks to be allowed to provide and outsource crypto custody and execution services.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/coinbase-urges-us-remove-crypto-banking-barriers?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: US Ethereum ETFs post record $1.5 billion daily trading volume amid Trump tariff turmoil
data.description:
Following President Trump’s tariff announcements, ether was one of the hardest hit, dropping 36% to a low of around $2,100 on Monday.
source: https://www.theblock.co/post/338748/ethereum-etfs-record-daily-trading-volume-trump-tariffs?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

data.title: Market Skeptical Of DOGE Hype, Questions Elon Musk's Execution, Bernstein Says
data.description:
Asset manager Bernstein reports that the market remains pessimistic about the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) initiative, expressing doubts about Elon Musk‘s ability to implement significant changes effectively. 

source: https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/25/02/43460243/market-skeptical-of-doge-hype-questions-elon-musks-execution-bernstein-says?utm_source=cryptopanic.com&utm_campaign=partner_feed&utm_medium=partner_feed&utm_content=site

data.title: Ethereum implements first gas limit increase since the Merge
data.description:
Ethereum has raised its network gas limit, marking the first adjustment since transitioning to a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus model in 2022. On Feb. 4, Etherscan, Ethereum’s blockchain explorer, confirmed that the gas limit reached a record 35.3 million at block 21771507. This change followed a validator vote, in which approximately 52% supported the increase, according […]
The post Ethereum...
source: https://cryptoslate.com/ethereum-implements-first-gas-limit-increase-since-the-merge/

data.title: Bitcoin bull trap? Watch these BTC price levels as BTC price risks $90K retrace
data.description:
Bitcoin bulls face an uphill struggle to stem selling amid worries that BTC price weakness will end up challenging levels around $90,000.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/bitcoin-bull-trap-btc-price-risks-retrace-90k?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: Here Are the Most Actively Developed Altcoins on Solana
data.description:

data.title: Eric Trump removes ‘thank me later’ from ETH promo
data.description:
On Monday, Eric Trump posted, “In my opinion, it's a great time to add $ETH. You can thank me later.” ETH subsequently climbed 5.5%. 
The post Eric Trump removes ‘thank me later’ from ETH promo appeared first on Protos.
source: https://protos.com/eric-trump-removes-thank-me-later-from-eth-promo/

data.title: Coinbase Urges U.S. Regulators to Clarify Rules for Crypto Banking Services: Bloomberg
data.description:
The post Coinbase Urges U.S. Regulators to Clarify Rules for Crypto Banking Services: Bloomberg appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News
In a latest development, Coinbase is reportedly lobbying U.S. banking regulators for more explicit guidelines that would permit banks to provide cryptocurrency custody and trading services. The exchange hopes to drive policy changes that would reduce current...
source: https://coinpedia.org/news/coinbase-urges-u-s-regulators-to-clarify-rules-for-crypto-banking-services-bloomberg/
